title: Modern Mangalsutra Pendant Necklace with Diamond-Simulated Center
materials: High-quality rose gold-plated alloy. Features black beaded accents. The pendant showcases a central diamond-simulated stone with a surrounding halo of smaller simulated diamonds.
features: Contemporary take on the traditional Mangalsutra. A sleek and modern pendant design. The pendant is an emerald-cut diamond simulated stone that catches light beautifully. It's suspended from a delicate rose gold-plated chain adorned with black beads, offering a balance of traditional and modern elements.
colors: Rose gold with sparkling diamond-simulated stones and classic black beads.
occasions: and as a thoughtful gift for the newly married.
description: A contemporary and chic interpretation of the traditional Mangalsutra. Lightweight and comfortable for daily wear. The pendant's design combines modern aesthetics with the cultural significance of the black beads.
